stanza.line: Lo as a careful huswife runs tocatch
One of her feathered creatures broke away
Sets down her babe and makes all swiftdispatch
In pursuit of the thing she would have stay
Whilst her neglected child holds her inchase
Cries to catch her whose busy care isbent
To follow that which flies before herface
So run thou after that which flies fromthee
Whilst I thy babe chase thee afarbehind
But if thou catch thy hope turn back tome
And play the mother part kiss me bekind
So will I pray that thou mayst have thywill
If thou turn back and my loud cryingstill
